about_the_game:
Gameplay: This game is a walking simulator.

Fear Experience: Realistic visuals, lighting, and 3D sound allow the player to feel fear just by walking in the game. The events that occur in this game both terrify the player and are key to progression. Don't be afraid, but look and listen carefully.

Exploration: Exploration in this game means that the player sees something. By seeing what you need to see in the gradually changing game world, you will get closer to escape.

Ending: There is only one ending to this game. The game will continue to loop until it is cleared, no matter how many times the game is over. Enjoy the game to your heart's content.

Play Time: The game can be completed in about 30 minutes to an hour.


If you video or live stream this game, you do not need to ask me for permission, but please include the game title or a link to the store page in the video title or summary section.

content_descriptors.notes: Psychological horror and grotesque expressions are present.

Gameplay: This game is a walking simulator.

Fear Experience: Realistic visuals, lighting, and 3D sound allow the player to feel fear just by walking in the game. The events that occur in this game both terrify the player and are key to progression. Don't be afraid, but look and listen carefully.

Exploration: Exploration in this game means that the player sees something. By seeing what you need to see in the gradually changing game world, you will get closer to escape.

Ending: There is only one ending to this game. The game will continue to loop until it is cleared, no matter how many times the game is over. Enjoy the game to your heart's content.

Play Time: The game can be completed in about 30 minutes to an hour.


If you video or live stream this game, you do not need to ask me for permission, but please include the game title or a link to the store page in the video title or summary section.
name: かいき LoopDown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/11　
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD、2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11 or DirectX 12
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You wake up in an unfamiliar building. You have to get out of here. You go down the stairs and go down the corridor to reach the same stairs again. The world repeats itself over and over, but each time it repeats itself, something changes. Eternal return. Can you escape from this looping world?
